metadata.title: CVE-2017-6280 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
NVIDIA driver contains a possible out-of-bounds read vulnerability due to aleak which may lead to information disclosure. This issue is rated asmoderate. Android: A-63851980.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6280` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.3.0-1-generic - 4.3.0-1.10
